Name: Fish Net
Description: Works just like a crab pot, but catches fish instead of critters
Config.TextureVariant.Name: Texture Variant
Config.TextureVariant.Description: Which of the default texture variants to use
Config.LessTrash.Name: Less Trash
Config.LessTrash.Description: Toggle to decrease the chance of catching trash (when possible)
Config.LessWeeds.Name: Less Weeds
Config.LessWeeds.Description: Toggle to decrease the chance of catching sea weed or algae
Config.LessJelly.Name: Less Jelly
Config.LessJelly.Description: Toggle to decrease the chance of catching any jellies
